group.headline: This is a conversion project porting the campaigns from Left 4 Dead into it's sequel, Left 4 Dead 2 (PC Only!)
group.summary:
Our team has made 2 versions of each original L4D campaign. One is an original conversion from L4D to L4D2 with the only new addition being L4D2 weapons, infected, and minor fixes to make events work in L4D2. The other versions of these same L4D campaigns will be brand new with L4D2 features, such as daytime, hard rain effects, counter strike weapons, new infected, crescendo events, et cetera...


We have VPK format available for each campaign, however they only work in Co-Op mode because of an unfixed L4D2 Source SDK glitch making the modes Realism, Scavenge, Survival & Versus incompatable in VPK format. We have a fix around this using exe format for simple installation of our campaign conversions that are not in VPK format.


Group ID: 1256662

For instructions, video tutorial, & all files needed please visit our steam group website!

group.headline: Free Frag Network Gaming Community
group.summary:
If you enjoy playing on our servers and have a few bucks to spare please contribute we appreciate any contribution. For a $10 contribution you will receive the following privelages.


1. Colored chat
2. Weapon Glows!
3. Auto-balance immunity
4. Round end protection (Invulnerable after losing a round, and cool super mario disco color)
5. Over 50 different glowing effects, on almost any of your guys body part!

Feel free to use [FFN] tags to show your support for our community. They are for everyone!


Server Rules*


1. No hacking, cheating or exploiting in any way not intended by the map creators or Valve. This also extends to third party programs that enhance your ability to play beyond normal levels (i.e. aimbot)


2. No mic spam. Short clips are fine, but if you are asked to stop, then you must comply. This includes screaming, singing or otherwise making annoying sounds into the mic. Level of annoyance is NOT determined by the creator of the sounds.


3. No discriminatory language. No racism, sexism, etc.


4. No being a douche. This includes disregarding admin requests, circumventing rules, rejoining to get around a mute, griefing other players (blocking snipers views, real world insults, etc)


5. Respect everyone.


*these rules are by no means set in stone, and can be modified at any time for complete and most accurate rules please visit our website freefrag.com

group.headline: O come, all ye faithful.
group.summary:
"O Alpha, bless our hearts and bringeth upon us a sheparding of many individuals, Pokémon and human, to this here altar, in honor of you. Each and every one of their embraces are our message to you that we uphold our faith."

This group is designed to be a general Pokémon community; one that does not harbor on one end of the spectrum, such as competitive battling or serious role-play, what have you. However; there are certain rules to abide by if one wishes to be accepted by our community--


1. No trolling, negative comments/opinions, or anything that may bother others. Elitism especially. Arguements will be allowed to run their course, but if they get out of hand and a lot of rage is involved, we will kick on sight.

2. Absolutely NO yiffing, cybering, or role-play sex is allowed. We won't hold you against it, but do it somewhere out of our gaze (i.e., a PM).

3. Light role-play is acceptable, but do no let it go any farther than that. We will let you know how deep you should go down the rabbit hole.

4. This isn't particularly a rule more than it is a statement; violating one of the aforementioned rules is judged by a three-strike system. First, we will warn you. If you do not cease and desist, a kick will occur. Three kicks means three strikes, and AFTER the third kick do you still revolt, we will ultimately sign a ban upon your name. No questions about it.



And with that, may you keep your nose clean and have fun here.

♦ QuakeNet: #newseries!
♦ Skype: newseriees
♦ SK: sk-gaming.com/group/15223
♦ Twitter: twitter.com/newseriees
♦ Live: newseries@live.com.pt
♦ Web: Soon

group.headline: Welcome. Please invite! Please Tag Up!
group.summary:
Welcome to PlanetXGaming! Planet-X started in late August 2009 and is still today not finish with our web development and design. Please realize that we are NOT a gaming clan but we do host events for clans to enjoy such as tournaments,ladders for ALL platforms,FREE giveaways and other things to make the community fun, but please feel free to tag up with our in-game tag to represent PlanetXGaming. The tag can be decorated anyway you choose but please just have the letters "PXG".

June 15, 2010 we have also began to start selling game servers,web hosting,dedicated server boxes and other services to any of our member of Planet-X.We are still in progress with the website,but you can still purchase any of our hosting services and we will guarentee 27/7 support for any users who wants to purchase or have purchase our services.If you would like any of our services customize to fit your prefences please feel free to contact us on our website.We will respond to your email within 24-48 hours.We can't guareentee anything but we will try our best to match with your needs.

We are also looking for any other gaming community or websites to partner up with to benefit both communities PlanetXGaming and your community.If you would like to become partners with Planet-X please visit our website and email any of our administrators about the situations and we will respond to your email within 24-48 hours.Please be sure to include as much details as possible so that way it will help us decide if we want to work as partners or not.We will email you if we are interested to please be sure to check your email daily.

In the mean time please feel free to browse our community and website:

http://planetxgaming.com
http://steamcommunity.com/groups/planetx
http://www.xfire.com/communities/planetxgaming
http://myleague.planetxgaming.com
http://rackethosting.com

Please post on our forums under suggestions and ideas that we can use to help Planet-X improve and we will do what we can to help all our members enjoy our PlanetXGaming community...In the mean time thanks for taking your time to read this,and we hope you continue to stay and PxG member!

O yea one more thing...if you think Planet-X is doing well another way to help us is buy donations. Not just money but old games non-use keys,consoles and any other thing that someone else may find useful.If you would like to do this please email us and we will guide you from their also.

~Skeeta (Owner)

[UPDATED 8.18.2010]

group.headline: Poor People Of Haiti.=(
group.summary:
Tuesday afternoon, January 12th, the worst earthquake in 200 years - 7.0 in magnitude - struck less than ten miles from the Caribbean city of Port-au-Prince, Haiti. The initial quake was later followed by twelve aftershocks greater than magnitude 5.0. Structures of all kinds were damaged or collapsed, from shantytown homes to national landmarks. It is still very early in the recovery effort, but millions are likely displaced, and thousands are feared dead as rescue teams from all over the world are now descending on Haiti to help where they are able. As this is a developing subject, I will be adding photos to this entry over the next few days, but at the moment.

The World Most Poor Country, became the world masacre,more than 100 thounthan people DEAD! Please help this people this people need you.In the street`s there are lots of people dead.A lot of dead people will not have a good funeral.I am sad by the masacre, but i am happy we can see the people helping each other,i am glad too see the faces of the people when they see the food.Please help them.
God Bless This Country.Thx For Reading.

group.headline: Land of Fruition since 09.08.2009!
group.summary:
Calone is a constitutional, liberal, and a non-partisan democratic society, which aims
to provide a non-violent and a joyful environment in which people can freely express their desires and goals.

The name, Calone, not only stands for the types of government aforementioned, but it also stands for
central node. The predecessors of the Steam Community have faced a great deal of instability in both internal and
external affairs of the respective societies over which they have reigned. The word, "central", refers to the idea of
stability, where the society will not be in a vulnerable state due to rebellion and dissatisfaction
with our government. On the other hand, the word, "node", refers to a point where no fluctuations (waves) occur.
Waves represent instability in a society, and a node is the only point in a wave of one wavelength where change
does not occur.

However, Calone's ability to ensure peace and happiness does not necessariy mean it will try accommodate
all groups and people. It is by common sense which a society must defend for itself from other raiding groups.
The raiding groups, apparently, can be considered those who oppose peace and happiness. The precedessors of Steam
Community have faced members spreading false rumours, calling people over here and there hackers and spammers.
Although members may have partaken in those acts, we should all learn to forgive and understand one another.
Over time, as our sincere desire to provide peace and happiness becomes evident for the citizens of Calone, people
will understand how maintaining such a peaceful state is much needed.

False rumours are nowhere to be true. One instance, which shrouds the actual truth of the matter, is
Michael Jackson's child abuse incident in 1992. People think that the King of Pop actually molested a child
that time, but evidence and eventual testimony claims that the child abuse is a lie. If you do not believe me,
contact me, and we will debate. I advise you not to heed to thoe liars who think they know a great deal about
the King of Pop.

Calone, as it develops, will promise to become more helpful towards achieving the ultimate goal in
Steam Community, peace and happiness. May peaceful freedom, peaceful coexistence, and peaceful Calone come to
fruition.

IN ORDER TO PROMOTE A NON-VIOLENT AND A NON-TENSE GROUP, IF ANYONE SIGHTS A DIRECT INSULT, TROLLING, OR SPAMMING
IN CALONE, PLEASE FEEL FREE TO REPORT ON THE INDIVIDUAL WHO POSTS THOSE SLANDERS. AS MORE PEOPLE REPORT, THE MORE
EFFECTIVE THE REPORTS WILL BE.

group.headline: A Tournament For TFC Ragers/Trashtalkers
group.summary:
"What the hell is Ragers Rumble?"

Ragers Rumble is a tournament where those who play Team Fortress Classic are pitted against one another to 'rage' and 'trashtalk' each other. There are no rules - think of the most horrible, digusting, low blow of insults you can think of on the spot and then let the "jury" decide who won.

The winner is decided via YouTube. The video of the round is posted and there is a 24 hour period where the people who view it decide who won. After the 24 hours are up, the person with the most votes goes on to the next round and the person who loses - well, they lose and not go to the next round but can try again if Ragers Rumble II ever happens.

The only requirements:
- You must have Team Fortress Classic
- You must have a working microphone

'Ragers Rumble' will have fight dates as soon as fifty people have signed up. After fifty people sign up, there will be a random choice of names picked out and the "25 rounds" will be matched up.

It's coming...RAGERS RUMBLE 2010

- Chuck Bronson

group.headline: Empire of The Future
group.summary:
Great Britain is an island situated to the northwest of Continental Europe. It is the ninth largest island in the world, and the largest European island. With a population of about 59.6 million people in mid-2008, it is the third most populated island on Earth. Great Britain is surrounded by over 1,000 smaller islands and islets. The island of Ireland lies to its west. Politically, Great Britain may also refer to the island itself together with a number of surrounding islands which comprise the territory of England, Scotland and Wales.

All of the island is territory of the sovereign state the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, and most of the United Kingdom's territory is in Great Britain. The term "Great Britain" (and the abbreviation 'GB') is the traditional 'short form' of the full country title 'the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland', although usage of 'the UK' has increased more recently. Most of England, Scotland, and Wales are on the island of Great Britain, as are their respective capital cities, London, Edinburgh, and Cardiff.

The Kingdom of Great Britain resulted from the political union of the kingdoms of England and Scotland with the Acts of Union 1707 on 1 May, 1707 under Queen Anne.

In 1801, under a new Act of Union, this kingdom merged with the Kingdom of Ireland to create the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland. After the Irish War of Independence, most of Ireland seceded from the Union. Currently the kingdom is named the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.


The British Empire was once the most powerful nation in the world at its peak, and arguably the most powerful nation in the entire history of the world. Controlling nearly one fifth of the world's landmasses and one quarter of the planet's population, the phrase "the sun never sets on the British Empire" was indeed quite true. Long live the British Empire!

Prime Minister: General Spock

Minister of Defence: The Doctor
- Department of War: Adm.Gen.Pershing and The Doctor
Head of the First Army: Sir Bryant the Chief of Army

group.headline: Веселый покер!
group.summary:
Prepare for a different kind of poker night in a very different kind of club. In Poker Night at the Inventory, you'll deal with Penny Arcade's clever, cunning Tycho, Team Fortress 2's hulking Heavy, Homestar Runner's self-proclaimed "awesome icon" Strong Bad and the hyperkinetic "rabbity-thing" from Sam & Max. These characters come together in ways some never thought possible, in a setting few would have predicted.

Telltale Games анонсировала необычный проект, который объединит персонажей Homestar Runner, Penny Arcade, Sam & Max и Team Fortress 2. В игре под названием Poker Night at The Inventory за карточным столом соберутся Стронг Бэд, Хэви, заяц Макс и Тихо Браге, чтобы сыграть в новую разновидность покера. Представители Telltale Games рассказали, что концепция проекта зародилась в тот момент, когда они задумались, чем бы занимались различные персонажи в перерывах между участием в своих родных играх. После этого оставалось лишь договориться с Valve, Penny Arcade и создателям серии Homestar Runner.

Bombeminister: MacGyver (han trenger gaffateip og en penn) (han kan også bruke micro bølge ovner og kniver og gaffler)
Tidligere leder og eneveldig hersker: Stalin (morradi)
Spillminister: GAMESTOP folka, lolz

Styreform: Kaosstat med hemmelig norsk diktatur.

Innbyggertall: Faktisk mer enn man skulle tro.

Offisielt Innbyggertall: En stor mengde masse folk.

Offisielle språk: gammel-Norsk, men til tider småprat...

Dialekter: Ny-Norsk, Ny-Gammel-Norsk, Ny-småprat, Ny-Arabisk, Ny-Ny-Norsk, Ny-Amerikans, Ny-Russisk og Ny-Mongolsk

Det er også tilfeller av tyveri fra De Øst Svenske Øyer, som vi skal gå til krig mot gangske Snart.

Avhengig av: Renta, McGyver, Sgt. Opkvitne
Uavhengig av: Morra di, ImpishRazor, Stalin
McGyver er Avengig av: Gaffateip, hubba bubba og en alt for kraftig laserpenn.
Valuta: 1 vodka = 5 paracet

Eier store deler av Stor-Norge

Medaljer:
Månedens tulling (Sept 2010): Sgt. Opkvitne
Årets No-Lifer 2010: Stealth
Mest homofile og/eller fulle person: ImpishRazor
Ukens Purk (Uke 37, 2010): Ninja Toast
Ukens Purk (Uke 38, 2010): Andr`w
Ukens Purk (Uke 39, 2010): P.T

group.headline: Sure to deliver destruction, Mayhem, and PAIN!
group.summary:
Welcome to the Demon Manufacturing Plant.

The dMp has been deep underground and have been training to destroy Earth for thirty years. The leader of the Akuma Choujin was Sunshine, the leaders of the Zangyaku Choujin and Perfect Choujin were Kirinman and Shimao. The dMp was short-lived, however. Sunshine made a deal with Shimao and if his students Rex King and Check Mate beat the Muscle League, Terry the Kid and Kinniku Mantaro, then the Akugyou Choujin would rule the dMp. But if they lost they would be kicked out of it.

During the fight between Check Mate and Mantaro the Perfect and Zangyaku Choujin dropped a giant arrow through the chest of Sunshine. The Akuma Choujin then revolted against the rest of the dMp and destroyed themselves. The headquarters on Mount Fuji was destroyed when one member pushed the self destruct button.
